document.title: The CSS Box model. The foundation of layouts on the web.
document.author: Ammiel Yawson

body.raw: Depending on your level of experience in web development, you may or may not have heard about the Box Model. It is a fundamental concept in CSS that will shape how you use CSS to build layouts.
body.html: Depending on your level of experience in web development, you may or may not have heard about the Box Model. It is a fundamental concept in CSS that will shape how you use CSS to build layouts.
